span.span: Arranges the content to fit a specified view size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在傳回的大小一定會小於或等於指定`finalSize`。The returned size will always be less than or equal to the specified `finalSize`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫之後完成 使用每個執行個體。Call after finished using each instance. 在後呼叫時，就會釋放記憶體回收，並不再被參考的應用程式。After is called, the is released for garbage collection and should no longer be referenced by the application. 之後呼叫及被釋放，記憶體回收行程可以取回記憶體和資源。After calling and being released, the garbage collector can reclaim the memory and resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 請務必呼叫做為最後的呼叫，每個發行執行個體。Always call as the final call to release each instance. 如果不會呼叫，資源會使用將不會釋放記憶體回收行程之後會呼叫網頁檢視器之前方法。If is not called, the resources the is using will not be freed until the garbage collector later calls the page viewer's method.

summary.span: 取得或設定目前顯示之頁面的頁碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the page number of the current page displayed.

value.span: 目前顯示頁面之以零起始的頁碼。

span.span: The zero-based page number of the current page displayed.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以零為起始：0 是第一頁，1 是第二個頁面上，依此類推。 is zero-based: 0 is the first page, 1 is the second page, and so on. 如果，就會顯示任何內容設為負數。No content is displayed if is set to a negative number. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
